column4: Yes.  I shut down at work, undoc the laptop.  Boot up at home with just the laptop display set to the correct resolution.  Shutdown, take the laptop to the office, doc it and turn it on.  Now the external monitor is set and the resolution is adjusted once again.
Xinarama used to do that without any issues.  Stupid lame binary, don't work with xinerama, dirvers suck that way.
I would love to but they don't support this chipset very well and have no 3D support.  I wish Dell would have offered the ATI cards with this laptop.
